techmeme.title: Sources: Trump's threat of "substantial" tariffs on countries imposing digital taxes came after Zuckerberg raised concerns about the taxes in a private meeting (Bloomberg)
Anthropic requires users to accept new terms by September 28, including choosing whether new chats and coding sessions can be used to train AI models (Hayden Field/The Verge)
Commonwealth, which wants to build a fusion power plant, raised $863M from Nvidia's NVentures, Khosla Ventures, and Google, bringing its total raised to ~$3B (Will Wade/Bloomberg)
Two House Republicans open a probe into alleged organized efforts to inject bias into Wikipedia, citing an ADL report about anti-Israel bias on the site (Emily Brooks/The Hill)
A review of the Honor Magic V5, the world's thinnest foldable phone at 8.8mm when folded, as it launches in Europe for €1,999, following a July launch in China (Dominic Preston/The Verge)
